title: Tune 3310
description: Ever miss the classic Nokia days? Tone 3310 lets you quickly make your own old-school 3310-style ringtone—tap out a melody, tweak it until it feels right, and save it as a fun little throwback.

title: Sonar
description: A slick, retro-style naval tactics game where you command a fleet, hunt enemy ships, and listen for that satisfying sonar ping. It’s classic Battleship vibes wrapped in a glowing CRT interface with smart AI, punchy sound effects, and lots of tactical tension. Easy to pick up, hard to stop playing.

title: PromptVault
description: PromptVault is a clean, focused app for writing and reusing AI prompts. It’s built for people who work with prompts often and want everything organized, searchable, and available offline. The layout keeps writing front and center, with helpful tools close by but never in the way. Simple, calm, and reliable—PromptVault is a place to save prompts you’ll actually come back to.

title: Sound Canvas
description: Sound Canvas transforms sound into living visuals. Experiment with styles, tweak the look, and export eye-catching audio art with ease.

title: Split PDF
description: A simple, friendly PDF splitter that lets you break large PDFs into smaller files right in your browser. Choose to split by page count or into equal parts—no uploads, no sign-ups, and your files never leave your device. Fast, free, and private.

title: LifeStats
description: LifeStats is a fun, interactive way to see your life from a different angle. You enter your birth date, and it turns time into relatable numbers—how many heartbeats you’ve had, how much you’ve slept, how many steps you’ve walked, and more. It’s not about being exact, but about making time feel real, a little surprising, and even a bit playful. Think of it as a gentle reminder of how much you’ve already lived—and how much is still ahead.
